author: Anonymous Calc
title: is comment for mark?
question:
(@dd-template-rules one-of              ;5 cases
      atomic-non-distinct ;Number
      atomic-distinct     ;"x"
      atomic-distinct     ;"y"
      atomic-distinct     ;"z"
      atomic-non-distinct);Boolean
Is the comment that explains the data type a part of the mark? For example ; 5 cases, ; Boolean
student_answer: I don't think so; it's for our better understanding.
